about_the_game:
This DLC pack contains a collection of high resolution wallpapers from the game Inside Jennifer.

This set includes 36 hot wallpapers available in Full HD, 2K, 4K!

Note: These images are exclusive and can not be found in the game!

Once the DLC has been installed a folder will appear in the games directory with the image assets.

You can find the Wallpapers by clicking on the "Manage" (cog) button then select "Manage" and lastly "Browse local files" a new window will open and here you will see the DLC foler "High Quality Renders"

content_descriptors.notes: The contents of this DLC are intended for ADULTS only and may include sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains a collection of high resolution wallpapers from the game Inside Jennifer.

This set includes 36 hot wallpapers available in Full HD, 2K, 4K!

Note: These images are exclusive and can not be found in the game!

Once the DLC has been installed a folder will appear in the games directory with the image assets.

You can find the Wallpapers by clicking on the "Manage" (cog) button then select "Manage" and lastly "Browse local files" a new window will open and here you will see the DLC foler "High Quality Renders"

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite 10.10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher

  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
